foreignObject.pre:
user@local:~/project$ npm run stylelint
no-disable.css 7:13 ✖ Unexpected "stylelint-disable-line" comment @isnotdefined/no-disable 24:4 ✖ Unexpected "stylelint-disable-next-line" comment" @isnotdefined/no-disable
no-obsolete.css 9:2 ✖ Unexpected "viewport" at-rule @isnotdefined/no-obsolete 26:14 ✖ Unexpected "box-sizing" value "padding-box" @isnotdefined/no-obsolete 28:2 ✖ Expected "grid-gap" property to be "gap" @isnotdefined/no-obsolete
unit-step.css 15:9 ✖ Expected "font" unit "1.1em" to be "1.125em" @isnotdefined/unit-step 16:11 ✖ Expected "height" unit "1.05em" to be "1em" @isnotdefined/unit-step
